name: sanmarcos
description: This file contains details of the assets used by Sanmarcos, the default Joomla 4 site template.

assets.name: template.sanmarcos.ltr
assets.description: The css file to be used when the site is left to right (LTR).

assets.name: template.sanmarcos.rtl
assets.description: The css file to be used when the site is right to left (RTL).

assets.name: template.offline
assets.description: The css file to be used when the site is offline and offline.php is being used.

assets.name: template.active.language
assets.description: An asset to allow language specific css, eg 'language/[lang-CODE]/[lang-CODE].css', to use it as a dependency to the active template

assets.name: template.user
assets.description: A file where a user can add their own css.

assets.name: template.sanmarcos
assets.description: The file containing the javascript for this template.

assets.name: template.active
assets.description: A dummy asset to allow extensions to use it as a dependency to the active template.

assets.name: template.user
assets.description: The name of a file where a user can add their own javascript
